text: The elder to the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth, and not only I but also all who know the truth,
speaker: Narrator

text: because of the truth that abides in us and will be with us forever:
speaker: Narrator

text: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us from God the Father and from Jesus Christ, the Father’s Son, in truth and love.
speaker: Narrator

text: I was overjoyed to find some of your children walking in the truth, just as we have been commanded by the Father.
speaker: Narrator

text: But now, dear lady, I ask you, not as though I were writing you a new commandment but one we have had from the beginning: let us love one another.
speaker: Narrator

text: And this is love, that we walk according to his commandments; this is the commandment just as you have heard it from the beginning—you must walk in it.
speaker: Narrator

text: Many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who do not confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh; any such person is the deceiver and the antichrist!
speaker: Narrator

text: Be on your guard, so that you do not lose what we have worked for but may receive a full reward.
speaker: Narrator

text: Everyone who does not abide in the teaching of Christ, but goes beyond it, does not have God; whoever abides in the teaching has both the Father and the Son.
speaker: Narrator

text: If anyone comes to you and does not bring this teaching, do not receive and welcome this person into your house,
speaker: Narrator

text: for to welcome is to participate in the evil deeds of such a person.
speaker: Narrator

text: Although I have much to write to you, I would rather not use paper and ink; instead, I hope to come to you and talk with you face to face, so that our joy may be complete.
speaker: Narrator

text: The children of your elect sister send you their greetings.
speaker: Narrator
